001package squidpony.squidgrid.gui;
002
003import java.awt.*;
004
005/**
006 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 7/11/2015.
007 */
008public class DefaultResources {
009    private static Font narrow = null, square = null;
010
011    /**
012     * Returns a 12x12px, stretched but curvaceous font as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
013     * @return the Font object representing Zodiac-Square.ttf at size 16 pt.
014     */
015    public static Font getDefaultFont()
016    {
017        if(square == null)
018        {
019            square = new Font("Dialog", Font.PLAIN, 12);
020            try {
021                square = Font.createFont(Font.TRUETYPE_FONT, DefaultResources.class.getResourceAsStream("/Zodiac-Square.ttf")).deriveFont(12.0f);
022            } catch (Exception e) {
023            }
024        }
025        return square;
026    }
027    /**
028     * Returns a stretched but curvaceous font as an embedded resource. Multiplies the default size of 16 pt, 12x12 px
029     * by the given sizeMultiplier, which should be rounded off if you want pixel precision. Caches it for later calls.
030     * @return the Font object representing Zodiac-Square.ttf at size 16 point times sizeMultiplier.
031     */
032    public static Font getDefaultFont(float sizeMultiplier)
033    {
034        if(square == null)
035        {
036            square = new Font("Dialog", Font.PLAIN, 12);
037            try {
038                square = Font.createFont(Font.TRUETYPE_FONT, DefaultResources.class.getResourceAsStream("/Zodiac-Square.ttf")).deriveFont(12.0f * sizeMultiplier);
039            } catch (Exception e) {
040            }
041        }
042        return square;
043    }
044    /**
045     * Returns a 6x12px, narrow and curving font as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
046     * @return the Font object representing Rogue-Zodiac.ttf at size 16 pt.
047     */
048    public static Font getDefaultNarrowFont()
049    {
050        if(narrow == null)
051        {
052            narrow = new Font("Dialog", Font.PLAIN, 12);
053            try {
054                narrow = Font.createFont(Font.TRUETYPE_FONT, DefaultResources.class.getResourceAsStream("/Rogue-Zodiac.ttf")).deriveFont(12.0f);
055            } catch (Exception e) {
056            }
057        }
058        return narrow;
059    }
060    /**
061     * Returns a narrow and curving font as an embedded resource. Multiplies the default size of 16 pt, 6x12 px
062     * by the given sizeMultiplier, which should be rounded off if you want pixel precision. Caches it for later calls.
063     * @return the Font object representing Rogue-Zodiac.ttf at size 16 pt times sizeMultiplier.
064     */
065    public static Font getDefaultNarrowFont(float sizeMultiplier)
066    {
067        if(narrow == null)
068        {
069            narrow = new Font("Dialog", Font.PLAIN, 12);
070            try {
071                narrow = Font.createFont(Font.TRUETYPE_FONT, DefaultResources.class.getResourceAsStream("/Rogue-Zodiac.ttf")).deriveFont(16.0f * sizeMultiplier);
072            } catch (Exception e) {
073            }
074        }
075        return narrow;
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Special symbols that can be used as icons if you use the narrow default font.
080     */
081    public static final String narrowFontSymbols = "ሀሁሂሃሄህሆሇለሉሊላሌልሎሏሐሑሒሓሔሕሖሗመሙሚማሜ";
082}
